forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine in the morning giving way to clouds and a few showers during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
